page.title: 20Wildlife on S/W Dartmoor
page.content: Most of our area is in the country so we have many animals.Here is a list of some of the animals to be found:-{ {squirrel,sheep,ponies,hedgehogs,foxes, {rabbits,deer and pheasants. }The sheep live un-fenced out on the Moors, or in fields,they have two uses to provide meat and wool.There are also many ponies living on the Moor,they are mostly{Dartmoor Ponies, }but we have a few{Exmoor Ponies. }The{foxes}eat small mammals,birds,poultry,and young deer.{Hedgehogs}live on the Moors,when they are frightened they roll into a ball.They eat earthworms,frogs and slugs.Most of the{squirrels}are grey but we do have a few red ones.They eat berries,buds,bark,birds eggs,nuts and fungi.{Rabbits} stamp their feet on the ground when alarmed.{Pheasants} live everywhere but especially in woods and fields.
